content: {"name": "Fourth Presbyterian Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We strongly encourage making an appointment. To make an appointment, go here: www.fourthboston.org/shop. By making an appointment, you will be prioritized ahead of those without appointments. If you do not have web access, text or call 857/496.5870. The reservation window closes 24 hours before we open for distribution.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.fourthboston.org/ministries/foodpantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": null, "address_2": null, "city": null, "state_province": null, "postal_code": null, "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": null, "longitude": null}, "phones": [{"number": "(857) 496-5870", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "16:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "15:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "1 person per household only"}]}
